Categories

Politics and Society

Red-hot political topics and discussions about our society in the audio live stream or the archive. Listen to people who have a say.

Sciences

Scientific lectures, panels and conferences in our virtual auditorium – listen live or download as podcast.

Arts and Culture

News from the cultural scene, streamed live and made available in the audio archive. We let artists, critics and curators speak out.

Technology

Not only for geeks: technological progress concerns all of us. Listen to live streams or download the podcasts.

Media

The media world is changing rapidly. Lectures and discussions about traditional media and digitalisation in the audio archive and in live streams.

Business

Business conferences and company events offer interesting insights into economic developments and useful career advice.

Some of the distinguished Publishers
on Voice Republic:

re:publica 2014/2015

Europe’s biggest internet and digital conference can be listened to on Voice Republic since 2014.

Frankfurt Book Fair

The world’s most important event in the book business publishes selected content on Voice Republic.

Haus der Kulturen der Welt

The international cultural center makes their project “100 Years of Now” audible on Voice Republic.

ETH/University of Zurich

The Center “History of Knowledge” regularly streams its events live from the Cabaret Voltaire. The colloquia and symposia can also be listened to in the archive.

Fraunhofer Institute

Voice Republic accompanies the “Urban Future Conference 2015” and gives everyone who is interested the opportunity to listen to the talks.

Maxim Gorki Theater

The Maxim Gorki Theater in Berlin is one of the most important theaters in the German-speaking area and publishes selected discussions, lectures and symposia on Voice Republic.

Mosse Lectures at Humboldt University

The lecture series “Mosse Lectures” at the Humboldt University in Berlin imparts knowledge on topics like history, politics, economy, arts and literature. The lectures can be listened to on Voice Republic.

What Is Voice Republic
Voice Republic is the platform for the spoken word. We make it easy to live-stream your event, presentation, discussion or lecture—and keep it in our archive for those who missed it live.

Users from anywhere in the world can tune in and add their thoughts to the "comments" feed—in realtime. Right after the live broadcast, the recording is automatically saved in our archive. Anyone can access it on our platform at any time, or subscribe to it as a podcast.

If you already have recorded content from past events, you can easily upload files to Voice Republic. Starting at 12 euros per talk, you can boost your reach and position your content from the fields of politics, science, arts and culture, technology and business in a guaranteed high-quality environment.

Listening is free for all users.
